name: Trijam 144 LifeLine
description:
Get to the end of the maze without letting your flashlight batteries die! The lamp posts are your lifeline, as they can charge up your flashlight when you click and hold on them.

Enjoy - and try not to get lost!

Made for trijam 144 in 3 hours and 23 minutes.

Player controller was made before hand, and the dither shader was found online.
